## Conversion.Converters.number variable

A [Converter](./ts-utils.converter.md) which converts `unknown` to a `number`<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
number: Converter<number, unknown>
```

## Remarks

Numbers and strings with a numeric format succeed. Anything else fails.
